name: Silicon Sword
description:
Silicon Warrior,

The computer you protect is under siege by viruses! Take your silicon sword and fight your way to the core processor and defeat this way. On your way, collect as many computer components as you can!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Movement - WASD

Jump -  SpaceBar

Attack - E or J or Left Click

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Also, there's a hidden GPU collectible in every level. I was gonna make it more of a thing but ran out of time. So if you can find them, they're worth a bunch of points and  I will think you're very good!
